narrative.narrative: Solaseed Air was founded in 2002 as Skynet Asia Airways and changed it's name in 2011. It's base is Miyazaki on the island of Kyushu. They serve 6 destinations under their own name and 5 under the All Nippon Airways brand. They hope to expand outside of Japan soon. They have 15 planes, 10 737-800's, and 5 737-400's. There are 2 737-800's on order as of May 2014.
